artist: Artpolice, Minneapolis; cover art by Ann M. Morgan; Editor: Frank Gaard; Joe McDonnell; Jon West; Coleen Salmi; Jennifer Sobin; Ed Rath; Eric Burmeister; Michael Brehm; Robert Corbit; Andy Baird; Mark Akgulian; Greg Miller; Craig Smith; Fritz Wolfmeyer; William McKearn; Janet Groenert; Michael Haiduck; Holly Anderson; Denise Monaghan; Chris Woodward; Carol Gaard
markings:
title across top: ART POLICE GAZETTE
inside cover: copyright 1982 ARTPOLICE
medium: Offset lithography in red and black, bound zine
text: Ann Morgan produced the delightfully playful cover illustration for the Valentine's Day issue of the longrunning Artpolice zine series. Published in February 1982, Morgan's illustration was printed in bright red, emphasizing the traditional color associated with the romantic holiday. Here, a lone young woman wearing heart-patterned attire enjoys a sweet treat. Floating potato mashers and a border garland of leaves serve as counterpoints to the figure. Morgan's pared-down illustration reads as humourous and innocent despite its rather surreal atmosphere.
title: Art Police Gazette: Valentine's Issue, Vol. 2, No. 1
